item.title: Version 1.2.17 (Build 20260101)
item.description:
What's New

Fix: Autocomplete method now respects mid-sentence detection

  • Added shouldSendForwardDeleteForAutocomplete() to check isTypingMidSentence and AX API
  • Modified injectSync() autocomplete case to skip Forward Delete when typing mid-sentence
  • Added skipForwardDelete parameter to injectViaAutocompleteInternal()
  • Updated injectViaAutocomplete() to check isTypingMidSentence flag

This fixes the bug where Forward Delete incorrectly deletes text to the right

when user moves cursor (Home/Cmd+Left) and continues typing in Firefox/ChatGPT.

Bump build version to 20260101
